zephyr.text

Class TextDocument

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.text.AbstractDocument
      • javax.swing.text.PlainDocument
        • zephyr.text.TextDocument
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.text.Document

    public class TextDocument
extends javax.swing.text.PlainDocument
    This class adds some simple features to the PlainDocument class.
    Author:
    Fuad Saud
    See Also:
    PlainDocument, AbstractDocument, Document, DocumentListener, Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • find

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> find(java.lang.String search)
        Iterate over the document's content, looking for matches of the given search.
        Parameters:
        search - a String to be found on the document's content
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing all first indexes of matches of the given search. For example, the following content, when searched looking for the string "double" would return a list containing [0, 14, 25]: "double string double int double char"
